This directory has code for assignment 2...

Server(Backend) is in express.js

Client(Frontend) is on next.js (react.js framework)

To run the projects - please configure .env file of server & .env.local file of client

MongoDB movie scheme is as follows
{
	"id": "<autogenerated>",
	"name": "movie name 1",
	"rating": 8,
	"released_date": "10/06/2023"
}

< server could have been in next.js itself but I did as per my understanding of the problem statement >
